name: BBQ Static Generator
tagline: Static Generator for your GitHub Pages Blog
body:
BBQ Static Generator
------

Current status: Under refactoring

### Highlights
* Building is based on human-readable text sources and other purely static resources (such third-party js/css, or images etc.)
* Performance guarantee with a cached, parallel and universal build backend
* "Component + JSON Widget" based design, which is highly extensible
* Type-safe routing
* Shakespeare based templating system
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
